mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, web, ip, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1) VALUES(contents_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{web}, #{ip}, #{passwd}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, web, ip, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM contents ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, web, ip, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM contents WHERE cateno = #{cateno} ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, recom, web, map, youtube, mp3, mp4, ip, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM contents WHERE contentsno = #{contentsno}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM contents
